content: Onnaam shushroosha
Praarambhapraarththhana

Kartthaave! Ee lokatthilninnu yaathrayaayi ninte adukkal vannu chernnirikkunna ee sahodariyude aathmaavinu bhaagyakaramaaya manavarayum aanandakaramaaya virunnum santoshapradamaaya vaasasthhaanavum nalkaname. Avasaanatthil mahathvatthodukoode nee ezhunnellllukayum neethiyode bhoothalatthe nyaayam vidhikkukayum ororuttharkkum avanavante arhathayanusarichu prathiphalam nalkukayum cheyyunna samayatthu ninte valatthu bhaagatthe kunyaadukallodukoode cheruvaanum avarodonnichu ninakku sthuthiyum sthothravum paaduvaanum ivallkku yogyatha nalkaname. Aabovabro......
(eniyono-masheehadaakh)

Aadaam makkall-kkuththhaanam
Vaagdattham che-ython mashihaa
Nin sharanatthil nidrithayaam
Daasikkekanamu-ththhaa-nam.

Nin karunaasa-ngkethatthil
Nidraavashayaam-sodariye
Nin mahimodaya divasatthil
Nin kaarunyam kaa-tte-nam.
Baarekmor. Shubaho ... Menaolam ...

Sthuthi thrithvatthin-marmmamathaam
Thaathannum than-thanayannum
Haaleluyyaa nirmmalanaam
Roohaaykkum paadum--ngall.
(kukkiliyon-anchaamniram)

Kanmizhikalluyarttheedunnen svargaalayane! - haale…
Svaami samaksham-daasan pol

Krpa nyangallilullavaavollam thirusannidhiyil- haale…
Krpa cheyyuka naathhaa! Krpa cheyka.
Baarekmor. Shubaho ... Menaolam…
(ekbo-hesu aaloho)
(mashihaa jeevichezhunnettu-enna reethi)

Mrthinilayam-Daivam pooki
Mrthiyavane-nihanichilla.
Avane ull-kkonda parethar
Jeevan poo-ndaanandikkum.
Sthaumenkaalos…

items.content: Thante prathyakshathayingkal thante aathmaavine ayaykkukayum thante varavingkal bhoomukhatthe naveekarikkukayum thante shabdatthaal mrthare jeevippikkukayum thante kalpanayaal kabaradakkappettavare ezhunnelppikkukayum thiruvishdaprakaaram avare maranamillaayma aniyikkukayum thante unnatha raajyatthilekku thante bhakthare uyartthukayum yogyathayeriya thante manavarayilekku avare praveshippikkukayum thante shreshdhathayude prabha avaril udippikkukayum cheyyunna vismayaneeya punaruththhaarakanaaya kartthaavinu sthuthi. Thante daasiyude shavasamskkaarashushroosha nirvahikkappedunna ee samayatthum

Jeevanullllavarude thalavanum marichupoyavarude naathhanumaaya mashihaathampuraane! Ennil vishvasikkunna evanum marichaalum jeevikkum. Ennil sangkethappedukayum sharanam praapikkukayum cheyyunna ethaathmaavinum nyaan punaruththhaanavum jeevanum rakshakanum aakunnu ennu nirvyaajamaayi nee vaagdaanam cheythittundallo. Kartthaave! Ninte prathyaashayil nidrapraapichu ee thaalkkaalika jeevithatthe vittumaariyirikkunna ee sahodariyude aathmaavine ippoll krpayode sveekarichu vaathsalyapoorvvam aashvasippichu dhairyappedutthaname. Ninte adukkalekku varunna maargatthil nyangallude aathmaakkalle apaharikkuvaanaayi antareekshatthile ollividangallil pathiyirikkunnavarum dushdanmaarude naashatthinaayi aagrahichukondirikkunnavarumaaya samghangallilninnu ivalle samrakshichukollllaname. Ninte samaadhaana doothanmaar moolam ninte vishuddhanmaarude bhaagyakaramaaya vaasasthhaanangallilekku ivalle nayichukollllaname. Vishuddhanaaya daivame! Ninte daasiyodu karuna cheyyaname. Kaarunyavaanaaya daivame! Ninnil vishvasichavallaaya ee sahodariye rakshichu kollllaname. Krpayullllavanaaya daivame! Ivalleyum ninne sammathichu parayukayum ninte sleebaaye vandikkukayum puthiya jeevante vaagdaanamaaya ninte thirushareerarakthangall anubhavikkukayum cheythittulllla orutthaneyum nee upekshikkaruthe. Dayaaluvaaya daivame! Maamoodeesaamoolam nee nalkiyathaaya prakaashavasthravum mooronaakunna mudrayum ivallilninnu urinyukallayaruthe. Ninte raajyatthilulllla vaasatthilninnu doore akattikkallayunnathaaya aa kadhinashabdam ivall kellkkuvaanidayaakaruthe. Randaam maranam anubhavippaanum “povuka, nyaan ninne ariyukayilla" ennu parayunna shabdam kellppaanum ivallkku samgathiyaakaruthe. Ee maranam vishvaasikallkku oru urakkam maathramaanallo. Kartthaave! Arivodukoodiyo arivu koodaatheyo ulllla ivallude thettukalle ippoll pariharikkaname ninte rakshayude thuramukhatthu buddhimathikallaaya kanyakamaarude aathmaakkallude koottatthil ivalleyum krameekarikkaname. Ivallkkuvendi ninnodapekshikkunna paapikallaaya nyangalle paripaakathayulllla nadapadikkum vishuddhamaaya perumaattangallkkum shakthinalki sahaayikkaname. Dosharahithamaaya niryaanatthinum nalla avasaanatthinum nyangalle orukkikkollllaname. Antareekshatthile upadravakarangallaaya ethirppukallilninnu nyangalle rakshichukollllaname. Ninte krpayaakunna chirakukallude keezhil nyangalle samrakshikkukayum duഃkhangallum neduveerppukallum illaatthathaaya ninte santoshabhavanangallilekku nyangalle aanayikkukayum cheyyaname. Ee lokam avasaanikkukayum nithyalokam aarambhikkukayum cheyyunna avasaanatthethum aadyatthethumaaya aa mahaadivasatthil ninte raksha nyangallkkellaavarkkum anubhavayogyamaakkittheerkkaname. Ninte thirumukhatthaal nyangalle santoshippikkaname. Ninte valatthubhaagatthu nyangalle pantikkirutthaname. Ninte pushdiyeriya mechilsthhalangallil nyangalle meyichukollllaname. Ninte perunnaallaaghoshatthil aninirannu nilkkunnavaraaya sarvvarakshitha samghatthodum koode ninteyum kaarunyavaanaaya ninte pithaavinteyum vishvaasikalle jeevippikkunnavanaaya ninte vishuddharoohaayudeyum krpayaalum manushyasnehatthaalum ninte bhavanatthile pushdi kondu nyangallellaavareyum poshippikkaname. Utthamanaaya thanne naam ortthu mahathvappedutthanam. Hosho…

content: (thaksheptho)

Naduraathriyilullavaayidumaa
Mahaneeyaddhvani kettiduvaan
Naathhaa! Nokkippaarkkunnen
Sambhramakaramaam vellayathil.

Yeshumahaaraajaavinte
Vijayakkodi udayam cheyyum
Aa nimishatthil krobenmaar
Meekhaayel thotteenmaar

Ennee vathsalasamghatthin
Therinmelavaneri varum
Annerattheritheeppuzhayil
Bheekarasimhaasanamuyarum.

Nithyan balavaan than thanayan
Balavaanugran bheethikaran
Vaanum paarum nirayunnon
Karmmangallkkanusrthamaarkkum

Prathidaanam nalkeedunnon
Lokaadheeshan vidhinaathhan
Thal peedhatthilirunneedum
Rakshakane! Attharunatthil

Cheyyanamennodu kaarunyam
jeevamayaa! Devaadheeshaa
Eppoll nyaanavidettheedum
kaanum nin mukhameppoll nyaan
Ennu vichaarichennaathmam
ninne prathi daahikkunnu.

items.content: Unnathangallil svargeeyarkkum thaazhe bhaumikarkkum kabarukallil mrtharkkum thante sugandhavaasana anubhavamaakkittheerttha sugandhadhoopavum parimallavaasanayumaaya kartthaave! Ninte kalppanayaal yaathrayaakkappettirikkunna ee ninte daasiyude aathmaavinum, ninnil vishvasichavarum ninte sharanatthil nidrapraapichavarumaaya sakala marichupoyavarkkum ippoll aashvaasaanubhavavum paapaparihaaratthinte santoshavum nalkaname. Ninte shreshdhatha udikkukayum ninte daivathvam vellippedukayum cheyyunna divasatthil ninte valatthubhaagatthe kunyaadukallodukoode ninakkum ninte pithaavinum parishuddharoohaaykkum sthuthiyum sthothravum karettuvaan ivalle arhayaakkittheerkkukayum cheyyaname. Hoshe….

content: (kolo-kukkoyo)

Paduvrddhathayil kaanaanil-mrthayaam saaraaye
Isahaakkodu chernnabraaham-cheythaan samskaaram
/tnin sharanatthil-maranamadanyolle
/taathmokthikallaal samskaaram cheyvu
naathhaa! Sthuthiyennevamivall-nyaaya-ttheerppin naall
Ninvalamaayu ninnuchatthil-ghoshicheedenam /thaale... U haale...
Baarekmor. Shubaho menaolam ...

Sathvaramrthiyil haavaathan-makalle! Kezhalle
Mannanumezhayumikkaasaa-paanam cheyyenam
/tmoraan thante-maareennundaaya
/tjeevanajalavum-paavana ninavum nin
Amgangallil ninneritheeyin -jvaalakalle neekkum
Paathakamukthiye nee nedi-kartthaave! Sthothram
/thaale... Ennaaghoshikkum.
(madaroshod-slekklasaleebo)

Dhanyan sahaje! Mrthiyaal ni-nne neekki
Ka-nnikalloppam-manavarayil-paarppichon.

Haa! Namme villikkunnazhalaal-haavamakall
Tha-n maranadine-vyathha nammallkkuyarunnu
/tthalpaapam-mochicheedaname
/tsatthamarum-dhaarmmikarum sahitham
Modamezhum-manavarayil-cherkkaname-neeyivalle.

Va-thsalasahaje maranatthaal-nyangallil ni-
Nnee-naall nee ver-pettathinaal karayaruthe.
/tnee mahimaa-voduththhaanatthin
/tdivasatthil-kabareennezhunnelkkum
Shaashvathamaam lokatthil-puruthejassaniyum nee.

Aa-nandippaan-bhaagyatthin maniyarayil
Sam-rakshakane!-daasiye nee-ettaname
/tdhaarmmikarum nirmmalamaanasarum
/tchernnivallaa-modippaan naathhaa!
Nin sleebaa-aapatthil-paalamathaay-theeraname.
Moriyo
(maar yaakkobinte bovuso)

Dai-vaathmajane! Shaashvatharaajyatthaashvaasam nin
Daa-sikkekuka dhaarmmika shuddhanmaarodoppam.

Ni-n kaippaniyaam manninmelampundaakenam
U-ththhaanatthil hatharoopatthe puthuthaakkenam.

Ni-n raajyatthil puthuthaayivallavakaasham nedi-
Ttaa-thmeeyanmaaroppam ninne vaazhttheedatte.

Paa-thaallatthil maranam koottiyorasthhikkunni-
Nne-kuka jeevan krpayaal ninne sthothram cheyyum.

Ka-mpikall patthum mrthyu thakartthiha maunam poondo-
Ree-veenayilen naathhaa! Kaattuka sahathaapam nee.

Kallarayeennum mrthare etteettuththhaanatthil
The-jomayamaam vasthram nalkunnone! Sthothram.
